title: magma in pytorch
body_html: I find that when I install the pytorch from source, I can install the magma by "conda install -c pytorch magma-cuda80", however, when I install the pytorch by "conda install pytorch torchvision -c pytorch", it seems that the magma does not be installed, why? Do I need install it extraly?
body_text: I find that when I install the pytorch from source, I can install the magma by "conda install -c pytorch magma-cuda80", however, when I install the pytorch by "conda install pytorch torchvision -c pytorch", it seems that the magma does not be installed, why? Do I need install it extraly?
